name: internxt-sync
description: WebDAV File Uploader for Internxt Drive. Securely uploads files to Internxt Drive using WebDAV. To run tests, use 'bun run test:src' which runs only the tests that have been fixed to work with Bun's testing framework.

scripts.build: bun build src/main/internxt-sync.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm && bun build bin.js --outdir dist --target node --format esm
scripts.build:bundle: bun build src/main/internxt-sync.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --packages=bundle && bun build bin.js --outdir dist --target node --format esm --splitting --packages=bundle
scripts.build:clean: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.prepare:publish: bun run clean && bun run build:bundle && bun run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build:bundle

author: ngarate
